snippet: The founding fathers established the United States as a “perpetual union,” a White House official said.
abstract: White House rejects online petition signed by more than 100,00 people requesting that Texas be allowed to secede from the United States; long-simmering cause has gained momentum following Pres Obama's re-election.
lead_paragraph: The founding fathers established the United States as a “perpetual union,” a White House official said.

headline.seo: Texas Secession Movement Unbowed by White House Rejection
headline.main: White House Rejects Petitions to Secede, but Texans Fight On
headline.print_headline: White House Rejects Petitions To Secede, but Texans Fight On
